title: A Quick Note About The Mini Episodes!
itunes:title: A Quick Note About The Mini Episodes!
itunes:subtitle: Hey Geezers! I know what you're thinking — is it Friday already? No! It's Thursday! Sorry! but I wanted to update you guys on what's going on with our mini episodes. Jackie and I have had the best time recording these episode...
description:
Hey Geezers! I know what you're thinking — is it Friday already? No! It's Thursday! Sorry! but I wanted to update you guys on what's going on with our mini episodes. 


Jackie and I have had the best time recording these episodes -- in fact, we've had so much fun, we launched a Patreon together! But between our own shows, the minis, and the Patreon, we feared that something would get lost along the way and decided it was time to take a hiatus from doing the minis to focus on Season 1 of Just One Episode. 


Just One Episode is what happens when Jackie and I launch a brand new podcast...every week. 


Think new theme song, new cover art, and a new topic....every single Wednesday. Members of the Mountain Dew Producers Circle tier give us some of our best ideas (well they give us THEIR best ideas, and we just execute) — thanks Jessica and Christina for our last two episodes, by the way!


Right now and for a limited time the $2 Palette Patrons level will give you access to one episode of Just One Episode: Our Spoiler Alert show. Come on in, check it out, and if you love it, you can upgrade to the Mountain Dew Producers Circle at any time. 


We're having so much fun doing this show and we hope you join us at Patreon.com/JustOneEpisode. 


Your money could be spent anywhere and we so appreciate that you are choosing to spend it with us to help us keep creating.


I am so excited to meet you all back here tomorrow for a new ep of Gee Thanks, Just Bought It! with special guest Kate Kennedy of Be There In Five. See you then and don't forget to join us on Instagram at @geethanksjustboughtitpod and in the Gee Thanks Facebook group, where you can get recommendations from other listeners, and give recommendations of your own.


Love you all, and thank you for listening.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
